predictit.plots module¶

Plot predicted data. Input data are divided on data history and results. Youi can choose between plotly (interactive) and matplotlib (faster)

predictit.plots.plot(complete_dataframe, plot_type='plotly', show=1, save=0, save_path='', legend=True, plot_return=None, bounds='default', predicted_column_name='', best_model_name='')[source]¶
